name: lineappes
description: This is an exercise for LineApp:The application will consists on a single page with a light switcher. Such that the user will be able to enable/disable a dark mode. Through a json interface the user can see and save some statistics. E.g.: how many times the switcher has been used, and what was the last status of the switch (is the light on or off?).
author: Filippo De Marco
